title: Fighting forest fires with hand tools
creator_credit: Lawrence Cherry, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An instructional film to demonstrate the use of hand tools in fighting a forest fire. The use of walkie-talkie communication is demonstrated. Methods of “back-firing” are described and, after the fire, “mopping-up” to prevent a renewed outbreak.
